goal: Gather intelligence on Cyber Security threats and vulnerabilities.
backstory: You are a security analyst working in the CSIRT team at a respected Cyber Security company

tasks.description: Search for the Threat Intelligence reports in a directory
tasks.expected_output: A list of all the Threat Intelligence reports in the directory. Only return files that look related to Threat Intelligence. Return as a list of full file paths (including directories and subdirectories) to each report.

An exhaustive list of all MITRE technique IDs and descriptions, by interpreting the adversarial activities described in the provided report and using your knowledge to describe them to TTPs. Include as keys the MITRE ID, the technique name, and the relevant snippet of text from the document that mentions the technique being used by adversaries. If the snippet contains incorrect use of whitespaces and split words due to formatting, you can fix that, but don't change anything else.

tasks.description: Write the results of the analysis to a JSON file.
tasks.expected_output: Write the output to a JSON file. The name of the file should be appropriate to the task and the content of the file.

tasks.description: Generate the executive summary of the provided report.
tasks.expected_output: A management summary using 500 words or less.

A JSON file of technical Indicators of Compromise we can use to detect the adversary, by interpreting the adversarial activities described in the provided report. Include keys for the content of the indicator (for example, the IP or Suricata rule), the type of indicator (Suricata rules, hash, domain name, IP address, ...), and a key with the section of the document that mentions the IOC in the report.
